name: NPR
text:
Amid the pandemic, overall crime dropped more than 30% in Baltimore, Philadelphia, San Francisco, Washington, D.C., and Chicago.

But there's a troubling rise in homicides and shootings. 
https://t.co/NjepSfQUwM

name: NPR
text:
"I did nothing provocative. They just started whaling on me,‚Äù says a Navy veteran who was beaten by a federal officer and pepper sprayed at protests in Portland, Oregon.

Local officials say the federal response has incited violence in the city.
https://t.co/QSnAZGf35Z

name: NPR
text:
The Washington Nationals have announced that Dr. Anthony Fauci will throw out the ceremonial first pitch on Opening Day on Thursday.
https://t.co/DyzkboNzNg

text:
Democratic leaders in Congress have asked the FBI for an all-lawmaker briefing about foreign election interference efforts that may be targeting the legislature this year.

name: NPR
text:
The white husband and wife who waved guns at Black Lives Matter protesters in St. Louis face felony charges of unlawful use of a weapon.
https://t.co/Z0c0I2RQ2h

name: NPR
text:
Tens of thousands of front-line workers in cities across the U.S. walked off their jobs and took to the streets Monday to demand racial and economic justice.
https://t.co/OWB1wWbiRH

name: NPR
text:
Teenage leaders in the global group @GirlUp went to their annual conference, virtually.

They‚Äôre worried, facing bad attitudes ‚Äî and experimenting with new quarantine lifestyles, including a "no-phone" detox.

text:

name: NPR
text:
With the coronavirus occupying global attention, there's less regulation of logging and mining.

It's worrisome news, because scientists are discovering a strong correlation between deforestation and disease outbreaks.
https://t.co/postNaVzG0

name: NPR
text: In "Wolfenstein II: New Colossus," hero B.J. Blazkowicz has grown into far more than a couple of chunky pixels. https://t.co/rNro5yTwcM

name: NPR
text:
Country music success tends to require staunch participation in the Nashville community. 

Amid a pandemic that has shut down in-person industry events, new artists are seeking innovative stopgaps to promote their albums. https://t.co/jKFcKUyQqt

name: NPR
text: As more states institute mask requirements, @WBEZCuriousCity answered your lingering questions about how, when and where to use yours:  https://t.co/6FdtN9NbbC

name: NPR
text:
"Dialectic Soul" ‚Äî South African drummer Asher Gamedze‚Äôs debut as a bandleader ‚Äî is a stunning protest album meant to soundtrack resistance anywhere in the world.

name: NPR
text:
Pandemic -> economic slowdown -> less shipping ->  quieter oceans = happier whales? 

Scientists say as boat traffic has fallen, whales may be less stressed thanks to a drop in underwater noise. https://t.co/uUbykFVpoG https://t.co/I8bHLMAZvp

name: NPR
text:
Puerto Rico is facing another emergency as the pandemic takes a devastating toll on the economy, raising questions of the island's relationship with the mainland U.S. once again. 

Here's a look at the origins of this relationship. https://t.co/rlmUbZZ21Z

name: NPR
text:
A former producer at Fox News, and another woman who appeared frequently as a commentator, have filed a civil lawsuit accusing Ed Henry of rape, sexual misconduct and harassment.

Sean Hannity, Tucker Carlson and Howard Kurtz are also named as defendants.
https://t.co/cDtOxs1RGk

name: NPR
text:
Brazil's citizenship minister and education minister have tested positive for the coronavirus ‚Äî the same day the country surpassed 80,000 deaths from COVID-19.
https://t.co/sTAe0pv04L

name: NPR
text:
Tammy Duckworth, the Illinois senator and Iraq War veteran, is on Joe Biden's shortlist for running mates. She has drawn new attention in recent weeks after high-profile spats with the Trump administration and its allies.
https://t.co/qfQaBnO7at

name: NPR
text:
NPR spoke with superintendents across the country about this fall.

They say they're determined to open school safely ‚Äî and feel dismayed by the Trump administration's efforts to politicize and rush decisions that could have life-or-death consequences.
https://t.co/kS1jQxsYCx

name: NPR
text:
Young women have emerged at the forefront of the fight against the disappearing of Pakistani men ‚Äî leading protests, making videos and talking to media.

"They feel that unless they speak out on behalf of their fathers or their brothers, no one else will."
https://t.co/dzCMUyCtir

name: NPR
text:
Kanye West posted, then deleted, a series of tweets Monday night claiming his wife Kim Kardashian was trying to get him hospitalized. His public comments have drawn both worry and scrutiny from his fans.

name: NPR

text:
Joe Biden is unveiling a new policy proposal that would commit $775 billion to expand access for ‚Äî and lower the cost of ‚Äî child care and elder care in the U.S.

It's the third major economic plan Biden has rolled out in the past month.
https://t.co/Mt9xqXPKc6

name: NPR
text:
President Trump is signing a memorandum today that calls for unauthorized immigrants to be excluded from census numbers used to divide seats in Congress.

But Trump doesn't have final authority over the census ‚Äî and it's likely to spur legal challenges.
https://t.co/goD7dkEKeb
